title: @Community: Post suggestions for a Rammus joke quote/animation
body:
Rammus is unique in that he does absolutely NOTHING when you type /j. Doesn't that seem kinda disappointing?

Let's see if we can fix that. Post up your suggestions for what you think Rammus should do for his "joke".

Note that you can still say "does nothing", but that'll be lame. Try to come up with something entertaining, but in-character.

Here's mine: **Rammus simply says "OK" out loud. Spam it for loads of annoying fun!**

replies.body: They see me rollin', they chasin'...
how about "Gotta go fast" or "You're too slow" in the voice of Sonic?

pls rito
I want an easy way to say "ok"
Just have him say "no."  Fourth wall = broken.

I think Rammus not using a lot of quotes is representative of his character. I think his joke should be purely visual, and have no emotes.

I think Rammus just falling on his back and rocking back and forth trying to get back on his feet would be a perfect joke to have.

Have him spin back and kick up dust while playing the Somic the Hedgehog Rev sound, then bounce a couple times. That, or have him roll into his back, wiggle his arms and legs, then eventually give up and just sigh and say "OK."

Also RAMMUS VU WHeRE? Pls Rito needs more than huedippoppysionvelynn combined.

Q: What does a turtle do on it's birthday?
 A: It shellebrates!

or

 Q: Why is turtle wax so expensive?
 A: Because their ears are so small!
